Saopštenje iz Železnika: Nećemo da ćutimo i mirno posmatramo Partizanov scenario
Oštra poruka čelnika FMP

03 Nov 2019


Porazom od Partizana Jadranska liga ostala je bez neporaženog sastava. Mada je poraz prihvatila sportski, uprava FMP nije želela da ćuti o dešavanjima sa tribina tokom meča sa Partizanom. 

Zbog toga se klub iz Železnika oglasio saopštenjem u kojem je oštro osudio sve što je viđeno u dvorani Aleksandar Nikolić tokom subote popodne."KK FMP ponovo je u subotu 02.11.2019. godine, umesto deo važne utakmice ABA lige, koja je bila i derbi kola (pa valjda i svojevrsna promocija srpske košarke u regionu), bio deo režirane predstave i „tako normalne“ revije prostakluka koja godinama gledamo kada je domaćin našem klubu - KK Partizan.

KK FMP kao dvostruki osvajač ABA lige, klub sa istorijom, rasadnik reprezentativaca i talenata, od kojih su mnogi propali upravo u samozvanoj „instituciji“ srpske košarke, već godinama je meta najgorih uvreda, i slobodno možemo reći mržnje kada gostuje ekipi Partizana. Čime je ta ogromna netrpeljivost i opsednutost KK FMP zaslužena (osim što smo ih sportski pobeđivali na terenu), ne znamo, ali smo u više navrata skretali pažnju, zarad dobrobiti ABA lige i srpske košarke, da nećemo tolerisati ovakav pir divljaka kojima su košarka i sport na poslednjem mestu. Nismo napuštali parket i pored činjenice da smo imali mnogo razloga za to, i u prošlosti, pa i u subotu 02.11.2019.godine.


Na najgore uvrede upućivane u subotu sa tribina u 8 navrata, zvanični spiker oglasio se samo jednom?  Sadržaj ovih uvreda nećemo iznositi u javnost iz osnovne pristojnosti. Ali, ako je to u skladu sa propisima ABA lige i načelima sporta, onda ova liga i košarka u Srbiji nemaju nikakvu budućnost!


Pošto smo od čoveka koji je trenutno na mestu predsednika KK Partizan više puta čuli u javnim istupima da je „dobar srpski domaćin“ nije nam jasno da li tako u svojoj kući u Prislonici kod Čačka dočekuje goste psovkama, uvredama na račun njihovih porodica, i najprimitivnijim izlivima mržnje?


Zato dotičnog, koji se očigledno kroz svoje javne nastupe bavi svima, osim svojim klubom (što donekle i razumemo jer je u košarku ušao tek pre 3 godine) smatramo najodgovornijim za organizaciju utakmice 5.kola ABA lige, a skandiranja sa tribina i napade grupe divljaka iza klupe KK FMP organizovanim i režiranim.


KK FMP zato obaveštava ambicioznog čelnika KK Partizan, da za razliku od njega, klub iz Železnika nije od juče u srpskoj košarci, i da će svaki sledeći duel, a organizuje ga KK Partizan – prekidati utakmicu i na najmanji povik i vređanje bilo koga iz delegacije KK FMP!


A srpsku košarkašku javnost kojoj je ovo postalo „normalan“ model ponašanja i „vruća atmosfera na tribinama“ upozoravamo  da se zapitaju zašto nam je košarka, počev od Košarkaškog Saveza Srbije i njihovih čelnika (koji su uz to i vrlo jasno navijački opredeljeni uz svu nesposobnost koju pokazuju), tu gde jeste, i zašto je meta uvreda tim i klub u kome se nalazi 10 domaćih igrača od kojih su mnogi, a neki će sutra sigurno biti reprezentativci Srbije?


Ako je cilj bio da neko po svaku cenu „mora“ da pobedi u subotu, trebalo je da o tome bude informisan i KK FMP  - da ne dolazi na utakmicu! A ne da se za to angažuju nekadašnji bliski prijatelji iz vremena SFRJ, „čuveni operativac i bivši sudija specijalac“ a da zadatak izvršava treći sudija koji je navodno „zalutao“ na utakmicu!


KK FMP će u skladu sa srpskom tradicijom uzvratiti gostoprimstvo KK Partizan NIS u drugom delu sezone, a srpsku javnost obaveštavamo da je disciplinski sudija ABA lige kroz dopunski izveštaj detaljno informisan o dešavanjima na utakmici u organizaciji „dobrog srpskog domaćina“ i njegovog kluba.

KK FMP nikome ne preti, ali nakon subote neće ni mirno posmatrati scenario u kome jedan klub, bez obzira na cenu, ponajmanje na terenu želi da dođe do cilja. Ako KK FMP sa 10 srpskih igrača i reprezentativaca naše zemlje, treba da bude deo te „igre“, mi u njoj nećemo učestvovati – ali nećemo ni ćutati", stoji u klupskom saopštenju.
Foto: MN Press

Zeleznik press release: We will not remain silent and calmly observe Partizan's scenario
A sharp message from the FMP leader

03 Nov 2019


With the defeat of Partizan, the Adriatic League remained undefeated. Although she accepted the defeat sportily, the FMP management did not want to remain silent about the events during the match with Partizan.

That is why the Zeleznik club made a statement condemning all that was seen in the Aleksandar Nikolic hall on Saturday afternoon. "BC FMP is back again on Saturday 02.11.2019, instead of part of an important ABA league match, which was also a derby car (and probably a kind of promotion of Serbian basketball in the region), was part of the directed play and the "so normal" show of prostitutes that we have watched for years when our club is hosted - BC Partizan.

BC FMP as a two-time ABA League Winner, a history club, a nursery of national teams and talents, many of whom have failed at the self-proclaimed "institution" of Serbian basketball, has been the target of the worst insults in years, and we can safely hate when visiting the Partizan team. What this immense intolerance and obsession with BC FMP deserves (apart from winning them on the field in sports), we do not know, but on several occasions we have drawn attention, for the benefit of the ABA League and Serbian Basketball, that we will not tolerate this kind of savage basketball and basketball savages. sport in the last place. We did not leave the parquet floor, despite the fact that we had many reasons for it, in the past, even on Saturday, November 2, 2019.


On the worst insult reported on Saturday from the stands on 8 occasions, the official speaker only spoke once? We will not release the content of these insults out of basic decency. But, if it is in accordance with the regulations of the ABA league and the principles of sport, then this league and basketball in Serbia have no future!


Having heard from the man who is currently President of BC Partizan repeatedly in public statements that he is a "good Serbian host", it is not clear to us whether in his house in Prislonica near Cacak he greets guests with curses, insults at the expense of their families, and the most primitive hatred?


That is why he is considered to be the most responsible for organizing the ABA League Round 5 game, and scans from the stands and attacks by a group of savages through his public appearances, which deals with everyone except his club (which is somewhat understood since he entered basketball only 3 years ago). behind the KK FMP bench organized and directed.


BC FMP therefore informs the ambitious leader of BC Partizan that, unlike him, the Zeleznik club has not been in Serbian basketball since yesterday, and that every subsequent duel, organized by BC Partizan - will interrupt the game and at the slightest shout and insult anyone from the delegation KK FMP!


And to the Serbian basketball public, to whom this has become a "normal" model of behavior and a "hot atmosphere in the stands," we are wondering why basketball, starting with the Basketball Federation of Serbia and their leaders (who are also clearly committed to all incompetence) which they show), where it is, and why the target of the offense is a team and a club with 10 local players, many of them, and some of them will surely be Serbian national team tomorrow?


If the goal was for anyone to "win" at all costs on Saturday, the BC FMP should have been informed - not to attend the game! Not that former close friends from the time of the SFRY, the "famous operative and the former Special Judge" are hired, and that the task is performed by a third referee who allegedly "strayed" to the match!


In accordance with Serbian tradition, BC FMP will reciprocate the hospitality of BC Partizan NIS in the second part of the season, and we inform the Serbian public that the ABA league disciplinary judge is informed through the supplementary report about the events organized by the "good Serbian host" and his club.

BC FMP is not threatening anyone, but after Saturday it will not even calmly observe a scenario in which one club, no matter the cost, wants to reach the finish line at least. If BC FMP with 10 Serbian players and national team members is to be a part of this "game", we will not participate in it - but we will not be silent either, "reads a club statement.
